summary: This document contains an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller regarding the confirmation of shares received for Southern Financial LLC. It highlights the establishment of a shell account and the communication between associates at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, involved in confirming the setup of a shell account and the receipt of shares.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is following up with Amanda Kirby regarding the confirmation of shares for Southern Financial LLC.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller are both associated with Deutsche Bank, communicating about financial transactions.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The document discusses the setup of a shell account.
Harry Beller is inquiring about the receipt of shares for Southern Financial LLC.
The shares mentioned include 78,709 shares of JPM Value Advantage Fund and 49,505 shares of JPM Latin America.
The correspondence is marked as confidential.
